posts.postText: Fire spread is on in the nether and the whole public nether was burnt down by gasts. Me,overclocking and two others rebuilt it out of cobble because ghast cant catch on fire/destroy. So can you turn off fire spread in the nether?
You can't "burn down the public nether by ghasts." ghasts are like creepers and destroy blocks, not burn them. I am confused.
Ghasts can make fire, so think of something to enable fire protection in nether
I'll see what i can do.
